name: Halimau
description: Playing with pun on Bahasa Malaysia for Tiger = Harimau & citrus = limau (Mandarin Orange is citrus fruit) Hence, Halimau. Also a Chinese proverb 苦盡甘來 meaning hard times are over, good times is here. But change it to 虎 (Tiger) & 柑 (orange) which sounds similar. Hence 虎盡柑來.
